parameters.name: FaceUntrimType
parameters.description: Untrim face edge type as defined by swFaceUntrimType_e ; valid only if a face is selected

parameters.name: EdgeUntrimType
parameters.description: Connect endpoints or extend edges as defined by swEdgeUntrimType_e ; valid only of one or more edges are selected

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance by which to untrim the surface

parameters.name: BMerge
parameters.description: True to create a surface extension that merges with the original surface, false to create a new, separate surface body

parameters.name: BTrimOppositeSide
parameters.description: True to remove the surface outside the selected surface edges or interior surface holes, false to not; valid only if BMerge is false

title: IFeatureManager.InsertUntrimSurface2
description: Extends a surface along its natural boundaries or fills interior surface holes, optionally trimming outside these boundaries or holes.
signature:
Feature InsertUntrimSurface2( 
   System.Int32
FaceUntrimType
,
   System.Int32
EdgeUntrimType
,
   System.Double
Distance
,
   System.Boolean
BMerge
,
   System.Boolean
BTrimOppositeSide
)

parameters.name: FaceUntrimType
parameters.description: Untrim face edge type as defined by swFaceUntrimType_e ; valid only if a face is selected

parameters.name: EdgeUntrimType
parameters.description: Connect endpoints or extend edges as defined by swEdgeUntrimType_e ; valid only of one or more edges are selected

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance by which to untrim the surface

parameters.name: BMerge
parameters.description: True to create a surface extension that merges with the original surface, false to create a new, separate surface body

parameters.name: BTrimOppositeSide
parameters.description: True to remove the surface outside the selected surface edges or interior surface holes, false to not; valid only if BMerge is false

remarks:
This method:
is valid only for surface parts.
requires preselection of the face or edges you want to untrim.
For learn more about Untrim Surfaces, see the
SOLIDWORKS Help > Parts and Features > Features > Surfaces > Surface Controls > Untrim Surface
topic.
